verses.roman:
cabbiśa vatsara aiche navadvīpa-grāme
laoyāilā sarva-loke kṛṣṇa-prema-nāme

synonyms: cabbiśa—twenty-four; vatsara—years; aiche—in that way; navadvīpa—of the name Navadvīpa; grāme—in the village; laoyāilā—induced; sarva-loke—every man; kṛṣṇa-prema—love of Kṛṣṇa; nāme—in the holy name.
translation: Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu lived in the Navadvīpa area for twenty-four years, and He induced every person to chant the Hare Kṛṣṇa mahā-mantra and thus merge in love of Kṛṣṇa.
